stories.text:
Thanksgiving is coming up, a lot of us will be visiting family, and we'll undoubtedly end up doing tech support.

What have you done to reduce how much support you give or help people remember things better? It could be specific hardware, teaching tips, or anything that makes tech more usable.
stories.title: Ask HN: What tips and hacks do you have for the less tech-savy?
Chezmoi: Manage your dotfiles across multiple diverse machines, securely

stories.text: I'm working on writing a new document to determine how to categorize bugs for my company, and I was wondering how you categorize bugs at your place of work, from minor to major.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you classify bugs in your company?
HTTP API and Solana oracle for weed prices
